name: Flicky Ninja HD
description:
Description
~~~~~~~~
FLICKY NINJA is an endless runner game.

Features-
~~~~~~~
- Tap to flick the ninja up and down.
- Make high scores.
- Run through iconic locations.
- Explore the world.
- Easy control (tap).
- Enjoy beautiful minimalistic design and relaxing game music
- Adorable , fun, and thoughtful design

If you enjoy endless runner game, you will definitely love FLICKY NINJA.

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
